name: xu
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a unit of money formerly used in Vietnam. It was equal to one hundredth of a dong (= the standard unit of money used in Vietnam): The dong was subdivided into 10 hào and 100 xu. The 50 xu coin is silver with pictures of three women on it.
More examplesFewer examplesHow many xu were there in a dong?You could buy a meal for just a few xu.One hào was equal to ten xu.
